lt.vtvpmc.vending.machine

Interface VendingMachine


  • public interface VendingMachine
    Represents a vending machine capable of selling defined products. Vending machine starts empty and has 0 earnings

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addProduct(ProductType productType, int amount)
      Adds product to vending machine.
      ProductPurchaseResult buyProduct(ProductType productType)
      Purchase a product.
      void insertCoin(Coin coin)
      Insert a coin into a vending machine.

    • Method Detail

      • addProduct

        void addProduct(ProductType productType,
                int amount)
        Adds product to vending machine.
        Parameters:
        productType - type of product to add
        amount - amount of product, can not be negative
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if amount is negative or product is not specified (null)

      • buyProduct

        ProductPurchaseResult buyProduct(ProductType productType)
        Purchase a product. Purchase happens only if enough coins have been inserted for a given product and product is present in the vending machine. Otherwise any coins inserted into the machine are returned as change and result is marked as unsuccessful (ProductPurchaseResult.isBoughtSuccessfully() returns false). If purchase product price is less than amount inserted, remainder is returned as change in ProductPurchaseResult.
        Parameters:
        productType - product to buy
        Returns:
        purchase result based on rules in the description

      • insertCoin

        void insertCoin(Coin coin)
        Insert a coin into a vending machine.
        Parameters:
        coin - coin inserted into the machine by the client
